p: All the populations from both regions revealed a weak positive relationship between genetic distances and environmental variables (r 2 = 0.389, p < 0.001). When Mantel test was calculated within each region it again showed a weak but significant correlation between the two variables in Quebec (r 2 = 0.158, p ≤ 0.05) and non-significant correlation in Kashmir (r 2 = 8.06 × 10 −3, p = 0.5570).
